  • Constructor Details

    • Phase

      public Phase()
      Empty constructor

  • Method Details

    • SetType

      public void SetType​(Phase.PhaseType phaseType)
      Method that sets the phase's type as the one it is given. Call this method in order to change the type of the phase from Undefined (set when the phase is created) to Build/Move/End
      Parameters:
      phaseType - phase type to set as this phase type

    • Init

      public void Init​(Worker chosenWorker, Board gameBoard, boolean bMandatory)
      Method to call when creating a phase. It creates an empty list of candidate cells that will then be filled at the right moment, it sets the phase type as undefined for the time being, until it will be changed to the right type, it sets the chosen worker and the game board that will be used for the phase
      Parameters:
      chosenWorker - worker chosen to play the turn (therefore the phase) with
      gameBoard - the currently updated board on which the player has to play the phase
      bMandatory - boolean that indicates if this phase is a mandatory one (Build, Move) or an optional one (OptBuild, OptMove, OptEnd). This parameter will tell if the player looses (mandatory = true) or not (mandatory = false) when not being able to perform the action of the phase

    • startPhase

      public boolean startPhase()
      Method to call when creating a phase, defined in the god power decorator so when the decorated phase will call the start phase the action will be executed by the decorator who extends the phase and therefore will override this method
      Returns:
      always true

    • IsABuildPhase

      public boolean IsABuildPhase()
      Method that tells if this phase is a build
      Returns:
      true if it is, otherwise false

    • IsAMovePhase

      public boolean IsAMovePhase()
      Method that tells if this phase is a move
      Returns:
      true if it is, otherwise false

    • IsAnEndPhase

      public boolean IsAnEndPhase()
      Method that tells if this phase is an end
      Returns:
      true if it is, otherwise false

    • IsMandatory

      public boolean IsMandatory()
      Method that tells if the phase is mandatory or optional
      Returns:
      true if it's mandatory, false if it's optional

    • getCandidateCells

      public java.util.List<Cell> getCandidateCells()
      Method to get the phase's candidate cells
      Returns:
      the list of candidate cells

    • getGameBoard

      public Board getGameBoard()
      Method to get the game board on which the phase is being played
      Returns:
      the game board

    • getPlayingPlayer

      public Player getPlayingPlayer()
      Method to get the player who is playing the phase
      Returns:
      the chosenworker's, otherwise null

    • getWorker

      public Worker getWorker()
      Method to get the chosen worker the player is playing the phase with
      Returns:
      the chosenworker

    • evalCandidateCells

      public void evalCandidateCells()
      Changes the candidate cells list of each phase according to its type. Empty method, defined instead in each phase type.

    • performActionOnCell

      public void performActionOnCell​(Cell chosenCell)
      Updates the board of each phase according to its type and the action performed on the given cell. Empty method, defined instead in each phase type.
      Parameters:
      chosenCell - chosen cell on which to perform the action

    • PlayerHasWon

      public boolean PlayerHasWon()
      Method that checks if a player has won, if yes it sets the boolean stating so in the player info, and then return true, otherwise false
      Returns:
      true if the player has won, otherwise false

    • SendCandidateCells

      public void SendCandidateCells​(ProtocolTypes.protocolCommand command)
      Method used to send the board with the candidate cells to the client by the phase
      Parameters:
      command - protocol command to send with the board and the candidate cells
